sentence.Network_en: "I don't know, " the other man said, "but this is a dromedary."
sentence.Network_cn: “我不知道，”那人说：“可这是一只单峰骆驼。”

list.abs: Arabian camels , also called dromedaries , have been domesticated for some 3,500 years .阿拉伯骆驼，又为单峰骆驼，已经被驯养了3500年。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French dromedaire or late Latin dromedarius (camelus) 'swift camel', based on Greek dromas, dromad- 'runner'

means.word_mean: 1. one-humped camel of the hot deserts of northern Africa and southwestern Asia

stems_affixes.word_buile: aero空气,航空+drom跑+e→跑飞机→飞机场
drome=drom跑+dary→通常指用来赛跑的骆驼
syn共同+drom跑+e→跑到一起→综合症
